title: BRIEF-Bailador Technology Investments Writes Down Value Of Investment In Stackla
text:
BRIEF-Bailador Technology Investments Writes Down Value Of Investment In Stackla

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 17:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bailador Technology Investments Writes Down Value Of Investment In Stackla Sept 26 (Reuters) - Bailador Technology Investments Ltd : * UPDATE ON STACKLA ENGAGEMENT WITH FACEBOOK * U.S. DISTRICT JUDGE DENIED STACKLA MOTION FOR TRO BUT PERMITTED CO TO FILE MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION * TO WRITE-DOWN VALUE OF INVESTMENT IN STACKLA TO $NIL DUE TO STACKLA HAVING NO ACCESS TO FACEBOOK & INSTAGRAM PLATFORMS * U.S. DISTRICT CHIEF JUDGE ALSO SUGGESTED PARTIES MEET COMMERCIALLY TO RESOLVE ACCESSS OF STACKLA TO FACEBOOK AND INSTAGRAM PLATFORMS Source: Further company coverage: BTI.AX

BRIEF-Bailador Technology Investments Writes Down Value Of Investment In Stackla
